meanings.definition: A person who makes something better.
meanings.sent1: The meliorators in our community always strive to improve our surroundings.
meanings.sent2: The meliorators worked tirelessly to enhance the quality of life for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The meliorators organized a neighborhood cleanup to make the area more beautiful.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude acted as a meliorator, uplifting those around her.
meanings.sent5: The team of meliorators transformed the rundown park into a vibrant community space.

meanings.definition: A device or substance that improves something.
meanings.sent1: The new fertilizer acted as a meliorator for the soil, making the plants grow healthier.
meanings.sent2: The meliorators, such as air purifiers, help to enhance the air quality in our homes.
meanings.sent3: Adding a dash of spice can be a meliorator for the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent4: Music can be a meliorator for the mood, lifting spirits and bringing joy.
meanings.sent5: The meliorators, like sunscreen, protect our skin from harmful UV rays.
